bug.summary: Inconsistency # calls between on_batch_start, on_batch_end in train and (val, test)
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>üêõ Bug</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Please reproduce using the BoringModel and post here</denchmark-h>
Currently, on_batch_start is called along on_train_batch_start during training but doesn't for test and validation. It results in a different number of function calls between training and testing / validation Proposition to uniform the internal behaviour: Move on_batch_start into on_evaluation_batch_start and respectively for on_batch_end, to be consistent with training procedure. <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
